name: Yashu
wishText: May the Good friends you made be always  with you! ;)  And There is no need to take any f******consent of your friends to call me just know You may not care about me BUT I CARE ABOUT YOU A LOTTTTTTT! even after 10years, To hell with what others think and also.......... ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you Yashu!! ohhhhhh! Many many happy blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it, And also call only if you want too and when you are free :D
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again,And remember I'll always be only one phone call away from you and IT DOES MATTER TO ME and I know you Don't have to fell the same
